forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain will fall throughout the day. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening mixing with snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. High 43F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 4C. NNE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 39F. N winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change morning snow showers to rain showers by late day. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: On and off snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 26F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 24F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies with light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High near 40F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
